meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #895.

td.p: Norman Sidebottom, a letter carrier from Pacific Grove, California
Robin Carter, a substitute teacher originally from San Antonio, Texas
Neil Landau, an engineer from El Cerrito, California (whose 2-day cash winnings total $25,301)

tr.td: SOUTH AMERICA
THE PLANT KINGDOM
PETER PAN
FASHION
SPORTSCASTERS
"RICH"

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_6_2', 'clue_DJ_6_2_stuck', '(Alex: You should be a good poker player because you\'ve got a great poker face. Looking at you I said, "Oh boy, there\'s nothing going on." All of a sudden, there\'s the right response.)

"Poor Side of Town"

Robin
')

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex [after seeing Robin\'s response] It happened in October of 1962. [After Robin\'s wager] $18,401! That\'s almost as much as you made last week teaching, Robin.)
NeilWho was Johnson
$1,000
NormanWho was Lyndon Johnson
$9,198
RobinWho was JFK?
$4,801
John Kennedy')

tr.td: 20th CENTURY PERSONALITIES
Johnny Carson became permanent host of "The Tonight Show" when this man was U.S. President
Neil
Robin
Norman
2nd place: trip on Eastern to. St. Thomas & stay at Frenchman's Reef
New champion: $18,401
3rd place: Jenn-Air grill-range

Robin
Norman
